傛字的基本解释

傛
róng
〔傛华〕中国汉代宫中女官名。亦作“容华”。
〔傛傛〕ａ．姿态轻盈美好；ｂ．生病不安的样子。

傛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róng］
［《廣韻》餘封切，平鍾，以。］
(1)同“容”。容貌。参见“傛華”。
(2)见“傛傛”。
[②]［yǒng］
［《廣韻》余隴切，上腫，以。］
动荡貌。

傛字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?餘封切，音容。【漢制】傛華，婦官名。今通用容。　又傛傛，便習貌。【前漢·外戚傳師古註】傛傛，猶奕奕。　又疾病不安曰傛傛。　又【集韻】尹竦切，音勇。【說文】不安也。一曰華也。

傛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傛字的起名意思

指姿态轻盈美好，如傛傛。也指中国汉代宫中女官名。

傛
Basic explanation of words
傛
róng
[傛华] The name of the female official in the palace of the Han Dynasty in China. Also known as "Rong Hua".
[傛傛] a. The posture is light and beautiful; b. Looks ill and uneasy.
傛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róng］
["Guangyun" Yu Fengqie, Pingzhong, to. ]
(1) Same as "Rong". appearance. See "Hua Hua".
(2) See "傛傛".
[②]［yǒng］
["Guangyun" Yu Long cut, swollen on the top, to. ]
Turbulent appearance.
傛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傛; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113-25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Fengqie, voice volume. [Han system] Huanhua, the name of a woman official. Today's general capacity.　I'm embarrassed, I just get used to looks. [Ancient Note from the Former Han·Foreign Relations Master] The 傛傛, still Yiyi.　I'm worried about illness again, and I said, 傛傛.　[Jiyun] Yin Yuqie, Yinyong. [Said the text] Uneasy too. One said Hua Ye.

Old glyph
傛
Name meaning
Refers to the light and beautiful posture, such as a 傛傛. It also refers to the names of female officials in the palace of the Han Dynasty in China.
yǒng, róng
